113.content:
"...I'm sorry. The number you have reached is no longer available. Please hang up and dail-".

Helen ended the call, "No longer available?" Helen pinched the note between her fingers and read it again. Seems like it was written recently, given the lightly smudged ink and the fresh taste of the cupcake. "I better get to the bottom of this." She said, gathering the feeling of suspicion and the need of donning her superhero alter ego.

By cross-referencing the phone-number via a simple internet search, Helen found both the name of the manufacturer and the location.

Joy Confections Bakery. Just on the outskirts of Metroville.

With that information, Helen grabs her car keys, a duffel bag containing her super suit, and a note on the fridge informing the family that she'll be out for the day. On the road, Helen kept a stern look on her face. Her mind constantly battled agaisnt her consiocs.

What's really the reason I'm coming here? Is it because I want more cupcakes? Or is it to solve the mystery of the factory? Maybe it's both.

The thoughts in her mind hadn't subsided by the time the tires stopped in front of the building. Among the outskirts of Metroville, this lone factory was the only landmark for miles. To answer one question, the outside of the building felt quiet and desolate. Indications of life are completely absent save for the trash blowing around the property. The neon sign reading 'Joy Confections Bakery' appeared to have been collecting dust for ages. There's little doubt that it's been years since it was last switched on.

However, the smell of fresh baked sweets remained in the air. Creating a pleasant, mouth watering aroma that clashes with the deserted environment. Either the air is like that from years of baking the factory has done or someone is still in there, crafting confections in secret. Despite the conflicting feelings inside, Helen desperately wanted to explore the factory.

Up above, a large open window pane became the point of entry. Helen stretched her arms onto the sill and pulled herself up where she vaulted over and landed right onto the factory floor where she discovered...
113.title: she finds out that they closed down years ago

choices: The factory is set up to make Helen fat.
The factory is set up to bake Helen into a gigantic rubber muffin!
1133.content:
Helen looked around the factory, it didn't quite seem to be in production at the moment, but by the same token, it didn't seem to have been shut down for years either. There was no massive layer of dust to be found for example, even if at the moment all of the lights were off meaning that the stretchy superheroine could only see by the light coming in through the windows.

Not only was there a lack of dust, but there was one other great big clue that this place had still been in operation recently, it seemed to be stuffed to the gills with the wonderful smell of freshly cooked muffins. Just breathing in was enough to leave Helen feeling wistful and she couldn't help but wonder if there might be some of them still left laying around.

That was a pipe dream of course if the place really had been closed down for years, but by the same token so much seemed to suggest that the factory had been in operation not so long ago, so it couldn't really hurt to take a look. Besides, given how run down the place was it was unlikely that anyone would be able to properly accuse Helen of trespassing, assuming there was anyone around to accuse her in the first place!

So Elastigirl slowly and carefully extended a leg down to the factory floor and then another before retracting her limbs and lowering herself down to the ground level. She began to poke around inside the factory, wondering what exactly had been going on with this place and why it seemed to have been closed down for so long, and yet still be capable of producing muffins, muffins that someone had made with her especially in mind.

If it hadn't been so long since her last major outing as a superheroine Helen might have been more worried and suspicious, well that and the fact that her belly was full of nice warm muffins left her feeling a bit more at ease with the world and a bit less on edge.

She extended her neck here and there looking for obvious signs of machines that had been in use recently or anyone else who might have still been working inside the factory, and yet no matter how hard she looked and searched she didn't find anything out of the ordinary.

Helen was about to consider the entire thing just one great big waste of time (there weren't even any extra muffins to be found!) when all of a sudden a powerful "WHRRRR" noise began to emerge from the machines that surrounded her.

"What now?" Helen couldn't help but ask even though there clearly wasn't anyone around to answer her.

To Elastigirl's surprise and confusion all of a sudden the factory seemed to spring to life as machines turned on, electrical lights began to glow and conveyor belts began to move seemingly of their own will.

"The factory must be near entirely automated... though that still doesn't explain how those muffins ended up in a basket with my name on it..." Helen pondered as she stood around watching and wondering what would happen next.

Maybe if she didn't leave just yet she might get a chance to meet whoever it was who collected the muffins once they were done baking, or if no one at all showed up, well then it wouldn't be such a horrible thing to help herself to a few more of the tasty treats would it?

The next major event that happened had nothing at all to do with cooking though....

From well concealed hatches in the walls strange gun like devices emerged and since Elastigirl was busy watching the moving conveyor belts she wasn't aware of their presence until it was too late.

The guns made a wet goopy sound when they fired and from their barrels emerged blobs of light brown gunk. Several of them slammed into Elastigirl's back, knocking Helen forward and onto the conveyor belt. Elastigirl used her rubbery powers to twist her head around so she could see what was going on just in time to watch the guns twist and rotate in order to acquire the correct firing angle to blast her body several more times over.

Whatever the strange material was, it might at first look like ordinary cooking dough, but it seemed to harden into concrete that was sticky as superglue! No matter how Helen began to stretch and squeeze her body she wasn't able to slip free, and the conveyor belt she was stuck to was starting to carry her towards one of the factory's many huge machines, Elastigirl had stuck around to try and find out how the factory worked, and now it seemed like she was going to get the ultimate up close and personal experience!
1133.title: She's fallen for a trap!

13.content:
Elastagirl was on a roll today. She had stopped 8 crimes, crimes the kids off at school, and cooked dinner. All with ease. This has never happened before. Her luck suddenly spiked with great things always happening. Even a little girl offered her a cupcake which had tasted somewhat funny.

She didn't mind the taste till after a few minutes later Elastagirl passed out on a roof while trying to stop a robbery in progress. "Wha-Wha- happened." Elastagirl moaned as the world slowly came back into view.
"Finally your awake." said a familiar voice. The source came into view. It was....
13.title: weight gain by force feeding

choices: Elastigirl puts on the new costume
135.content:
Emerging from the darkness, practically hopping on her heels was Edna Mode, costume designer extraordinary.
"Eugh..." Helen began, shaking off her daze, "W-what happened?"
"A wardrobe malfunction dahling, nothing to worry about, we just need to take a closer look..."
Edna withdrew a small remote and pressed it, causing a large circular podium to rise up from under Helen as she was hoisted a few feet into the air.
Within seconds an autonomous drone had flown around Elastigirl projecting a grid from its camera onto her - it whipped around and continued to scan her, sending refracted lasers around her like a Pink Floyd light show.
When it had finished, the large screen behind her had turned on, revealing a digital Helen rotating in 360 degrees.
The podium beneath Helen slowly descended as she found herself on equal footing with Edna Mode, the designer was squinting at the model, looking for something...

"Hmmm... Computer, dahling , zoom in on hem quadrant three dash four..."
The model stopped rotating on screen as the view focused on Helens posterior and began to zoom in.
"Seam six, stitch three..."
Helen watched the camera continue to zoom in as the view began super-magnified, the fabric of the costume was rendered with just a criss-crossing pattern of stitches. Suddenly, it came into view all at once; in a flawless weaving of thread, one single stitch had become frayed, loosening itself from the collective.

"Just as I predicted..." Edna tutted. "A wardrobe malfunction."
"A wardrobe mal- but it's just one stitch, how could-" Helen began, but was soon cut off.
"Computer! Simulate stretch sequence with current suit condition."

Helen turned her gaze back to the screen to watch as the limbs of her digital counterpart were stretched into opposite directions, only instead of having the fabric follow her flexibly, it became unstable and fell off her body all at once.

"Oh.. my..." Helen stood aghast, watching her now naked body taking up the screen, her suit completely unraveled.
"Wardrobe malfunction." Edna Mode stated matter-o-factly.
Helen turned to the designer with worry in her eyes. "Well, can that be fixed?"
Edna simply snorted, "The composition of your suit is re-flexible and reinforced alloys - you stretch, it stretches. When you return to your normal dimensions, it does too. What we have here, dahling, is your suit is trying to return to a dimension smaller than itself."
"Wait you mean..."
Edna rolled her eyes, "The suit is having some difficulty reforming around this..."
With one quick snap of her hand, Edna Mode had reached up and slapped Helen's rear causing her to yelp in shock.
"You've put on some weight dahling, I wasn't going to say anything but now bedside manner is hardly professional."

Helen withdrew with a look of guilt, biting her bottom lip as she looked back towards the screen, her butt still stinging with reminder.
"Don't worry dahling, I can fix this, in fact, I have been fixing it, and now you will test the "Helen Super Mk. II"
With another press of the remote, a small door opened on the opposite side of the room revealing a new Super Suit.
"Change into it and meet me next door - I need to test the limits so we don't have a scandal on our hands..."
135.title: Edna Mode. Needs to test the suits limit.

1351.content:
Inside the changing room, Helen Parr suited up accordingly - her new costume was very similar to the last one, in fact the only stand-out feature was that the collar seemed to glow a dull green. She glanced into the mirror ahead and took in a moment to take in her figure - her eyes stopped when the reached her behind.
Sighing, she turned to get a better view - the situation had not improved.
It gave her pause, reflecting on her glory days when she was the svelte Elastigirl, she still was, albeit a slightly heavier Elastiwoman in the years gone by.
Still, if anyone could fix a problem with her suit it was Edna Mode.

Elastigirl finished her musing and left the changing room, her footsteps echoing through the massive facility as she made her way next door.
Edna was already waiting for her, a clipboard in hand and the scrutinizing look that was her default gaze.
"Turn." She said, circling her finger in the air.
Helen obliged, spinning slowly to show off the costume from every angle.
"Good... Edna ticked off a checkbox on the clipboard.
What followed next was a series of commands that Helen followed, from touching the ceiling to using her legs to reach the corners of the room - each demonstration was rewarded with its own check from the list until at last the page was finished.
"Very good dahling, the suit conforms with your present figure."
Helen let out a sigh of relief, at least now she wouldn't have to worry about her -
"But!" Edna continued, "We need to see if it can conform to a new default dimension."

With another press of the button from her remote, a single rectangular panel in the center of the floor had slid out of the way as a table was lifted into the room to take its place.
On its surface was a literal smörgåsbord of delicious dishes, desserts, main courses, hot and cold servings, all of them prepared to serve.
Helen was lead by the hand to the end of the table where she found a chair waiting for her, she took a seat as Edna turned the page over on her clipboard.
"You can eat now dahling."

Helen began reluctantly on a spare bit of ribs on her first plate, before finding some waffles and whipped cream to start on next. What began as disinterested nibbles had soon evolved to enjoying the mix of flavors available, a culinary blend that must have been the work of 10 chefs at least.
The pace quickened and before long, Helen had polished off a true meal - finishing with a bit of lava cake she sat back content, breathing a sigh of relief.

"That was good," she mused, "What now?"
But Edna was transfixed on the collar around Elastigirls neck, which was now glowing a dull red. Helen caught her gaze and examined it as well.
"Your collar is fitted with its own neural network designed to detect shapes in its form." Edna began, "It stay red when it is calculating its new form, and it will turn green when it has finished mapping out your new dimensions. You must continue eating until it turns green - it shouldn't be too much longer dahling..."

"Oh," Elastigirl returned, "Well... sure I guess I could have a bit of..." Helen began picking at the remaining desserts around her plate, she was definitely getting full, but she still had room. Helen continued to eat until at last she breathed a heavy sigh and fell back into her chair.

"Oooh... I don't think I could eat another bite..."

Edna Mode however seemed to take no notice, and once again narrowed her eyes at the collar, which Helen realized was switching back and forth from green and red like a festive turn signal.

"Err... What does that mean?"
"It means that the suit is 99% complete, dahling. Just one percent left."
"Oooh... I don't know if I can -"
"Not to worry dahling, I've prepared for this too."

And with that, Edna Mode had withdrawn the remote once more, pressing a button that caused Helens chair to tilt upwards as a massive device from the ceiling began to lower. It scanned Helens body in similar manner to the drone and in an instant had scanned the food on the table as well, after a quick moment of calculation, a heavy whirring sound could be heard above.

"It's blending - all of the required nutrients have been selected as an easy-to-swallow paste."

Helen looked at from the machine to Edna in confusion, and the next second she watched as a autonomous hose descended from the ceiling and plugged itself into her mouth. In one single pump, not dissimilar to a shotgun blast, a thick rich mixture had been thundered through the hose and into Helens mouth which came so quickly that she hadn't even realized she had swallowed.
The pipe was immediately withdrawn and Helen was left licking her lips.

"I hope that wasn't too traumatic dahling..."
"Ooh... no, actually... that was *hic* really good..."
Within the mixture she could still taste every individual dish, it was a surge of flavor that was experienced in a nano-second, yet still lingered.
"We are ready to test now," Edna remarked, acknowledging the collar, which was now glowing a steady green.

Helen obliged and got up, one hand resting on her stomach as she thought back on the flavors that had passed her lips in an instant.
"Reach up to the ceiling with both hands, then return them to your sides."
It was finished in an instant, though when Elastigirl's limbs had returned, the collar was suddenly glowing red.

Edna Mode tutted as she recorded the results on her clipboard. "As expected." she resigned.
"Err.. was it supposed to do that?"
"No dahling, but I expected that it would - further testing is needed, but not now. Go home and rest, then return tomorrow."

Helen nodded and left Edna's headquarters full and content, she didn't even really mind having to test, so long as she could avoid her suit bearing all in the future...
1351.title: Elastigirl puts on the new costume

13511.content:
Helen had returned to the facility the next day to find Edna Mode waiting for her, she was lead back into the same room as she resumed her post.

"The Mk. II is in a constant state of reforming itself," Edna explained, "Once it understands how to correctly determine your new default shape, you will have nothing to fear, dahling."

Helen nodded as she began to dig in, however she noticed that she didn't achieve nearly the same sense of pleasure that she had gotten from the machine at the end of yesterdays session - perhaps it was the immediate release of a mixture of flavors all at the same time...

"Something the matter?" questioned Edna, taking in the look of deep thought that had taken over Elastigirl.
"Oh, umm..." Helen began, swallowing the latest bite, "I was just wondering about the machine."
"Yes?"
"Can we, I mean isn't it quicker to..."
Edna squinted as she tried to read Helen with a bit of skepticism.
"Your suit is designed to calculate tiny changes over the course of time and adjust itself accordingly."
"Oh." Helen couldn't help but sound a little disappointed, which Edna caught immediately with interest.
"Hold on, dahling, we could override the network to detect immediate changes instead..."
Edna reflected on her notes as Helen looked up towards the machine, lying in wait.
"This would mean further testing however," Edna posed, "All innovation does..."
Helen thought back to the thick mixture she had received yesterday, now craving it.
She looked hungrily towards Edna, "I'll do it."
"Very good dahling."
Pressing the remote button, the machine whirred to life and the hose began to descend towards Helen, she found herself leaning forward to meet it, prepared for its payload.
After the mixing had finished, three distinct throbs had echoed through the hose, arriving at Helens mouth which was filled with the thick mixture - she had already swallowed all three before she even realized.
Helen was lost in flavor heaven, desperately tonging around her mouth for a hint of what had just passed by seconds before, ignoring the stuffed sensation that told her that she was painfully full. In response the collar had turned green, but then blinked back into red. Helen hadn't even noticed, but Edna had.

"It has skipped over the calibration stage entirely." Edna quipped referring to her notes, "We will need further testing, at least a weeks worth..."
"A week?..." Helen snapped back from the sensation of flavor.
"Seven days dahling, necessary for a calibration process."
Helen scribbled something new in the margin of her notes, then directed her attention back to the collar, still a steady red.
"We will fix this by then, and I will see you tomorrow..."
13511.title: The next day...

choices: Mr. Incredible grows concerned for Elastigirl.
135111.content:
And so it went.

Every morning Helen Parr would wake up, have breakfast, send Dash and Violet to school, eat lunch and take care of Jack-Jack until she left for her appointment with Edna, and then return home, skip dinner and go to bed with Bob.
At first, the details were only so that a keen fashion eye like Edna's could realize it, but it had started to become obvious; the effects of the machine were starting to have a permanent effect on Helens figure and it had become obvious that Helen was starting to put on quite a bit of weight from the feeding machine.
On the fifth day, Helen had gone through her routine, returning home for bed when she woke up the next day and everything had changed...

***

Elastigirl woke on the sixth day of testing in her bedroom, she licked her lips fondly and thought back to the previous session with Edna. She could tell her appetite was improving, it now took her longer to reach the point where she was completely stuffed, too full to eat dinner when she came home even.
It was all approved by Edna Mode of course, who took to manually recalibrating the suit and provided Helen with words of encouragement through it all.
The bed audibly creaked and groaned as Helen rose from it, standing at full height she found herself reflected in the mirror across the room - it was a stark contrast to say the least...

In the time since testing began Helen had put on close to 40 pounds and it was obvious everywhere you looked - her thighs and hips had both grown wide from her near-constant feeding, her stomach had became rounded in a paunch, and her arms had gotten softer in the interim as well. Her chubby cheeks and chin were also showing her weight gain, with a double chin forming and two dimples revealed when she smiled.

None of her developments could hold a candle to Mrs. Parrs "Incredible" Ass however. Already big to begin with, it was getting bigger every day, its rounded contour could be easily seen at any angle.

Normally this sight might shock Helen, but honestly at this point she was too far deep into her routine that it didn't bother her - what mattered was getting everything done around the house so she could re-calibrate her suit, and of course, drink up the thick mixture provided by the machine...

Helen carried these thoughts with her as she descended to the main floor, and prepared a breakfast for Dash and Violet.
Fluffy pancakes drizzled with maple syrup and coated with whipped cream, though they were more for herself than anyone else.
Dash only managed to speed eat through two pancakes before he was racing off through the door.
Violet had already eaten a bowl of cereal earlier, her daughters invisible antics had gone on undetected.
Helen was left to finish off the batch herself alone, her stomach nearly filled before she even started the day.
After taking the kids to school, Elastigirl returned home to Jack-Jack, taking care of him and waiting until she could sit down to a proper lunch of leftover lasagna dinner. As she chewed her way through the meal, her thoughts again returned to the feeding machine and it's medley of flavors delivered instantly - she ate the rest of her meal longing for something more filling, more substantial. She wanted to be stuffed.
Casting her bowl aside, Helen brought the tray of lasagna towards her, plunging her fork into the dish and eating with gusto.
She tried her best to fill her cheeks and swallow quickly, just hoping to recreate the sensation from the machine, but it was never close enough.
With the entire tray polished off, Helen laid back in her chair, taking shallow breaths as she attempted to quell her stomach.

After she picked up the kids from school she continued biding her time, just waiting for the best part of her day. When it finally arrived, Helen got into her car and drove off towards Edna Mode's facility, her stomach growling the entire time.

In a matter of minutes, Helen was already hooked up to the machine, fervently gulping down the mixture as Edna reflected on her notes.
"Your suit should be fully calibrated tomorrow dahling, it should be familiar enough with your form..."
But Helen wasn't even listening, she was too focused on the steady mixture of flavors being delivered from the hose, eagerly tonging the mix as it passed down her throat. With a click of the remote the machine was turned off as it ascended back into the ceiling, Helen was left licking her lips and groaning, almost too full to move, but somehow she managed.

The drive back home was uneventful, she pulled into the driveway and turned off the engine as she prepared to enter the house...
135111.title: A Weeks worth of testing...

choices: Bob decides that he has to say something about Helen's weight
Bob decides to save his rant for another night...
1351111.content:
The transformation hadn't been lost on the rest of the Incredible family, especially for Bob Parr who had been observing Helen's changes with growing concern.
At first it was the nightly disappearances that planted the seed of worry, though he knew to keep his distance as he had run a similar gamut himself a few years prior - Bob knew that it would be too forward, and hypocritical, to mention it.
Next was Helen's change in demeanor; it was if her thoughts were clearly elsewhere (perhaps on someone else) but again Bob didn't want to press in part because he didn't want to make his fears a reality - any whisper of an affair had been pushed into the back of his mind - the seeds of doubt had been planted, and the last few weeks had seen them blooming alongside Helen.

As the sound of the idling engine gave way to the chirping of crickets, Bob prepared himself for the confrontation that he had played out in his mind for the past several hours.

The door swung open with fanfare as Helen Parr carried in a pair of large brown grocery bags that obscured her face, she very nearly teetered off-balance as she stretched out a leg behind to close it behind her,but managed to regain her composure.
Completely unaware that Bob was standing by, Helen carried on into the kitchen as she began to stock the refrigerator, stretching her limbs to accommodate the refilling mission as he awkwardly trailed after her.

Mister Incredible had managed to round the corner just as she was bending over to place a large chocolate cake on the bottom shelf, her ample rear end perking up as she looked for more space inside. He could do little more than stare as he took in the sight; her oversized posterior nearly taking up the width of the fridge itself as she shifted ingredients about, balancing its weight between her two thick thighs and grunting as she struggled to fit the similarly-oversized pastry box just above the crisper.

Trying his best to make his presence known without catching Helen off guard, Bob cleared his throat,
"Erm... Honey?"
Elastigirl could only spin about on the spot and catch his eye, backing out from the refrigerator as a bit of chocolate sponge dotted her lips.
"Mmm! Bob! I didn't... *chew* know you were still... *chew* up"
"I uh... couldn't sleep", Mister Incredible shrugged as he tried to save face - it was partially true after all.
"Well..." began Elastigirl, chewing the last bit of chocolate cake, "When I can't sleep, I usually get a glass of warm milk. Here."
Helen reached into the fridge, pulling out a carton from the back before pouring it into a glass a few yards away. In one smooth motion, she managed to lift the drink into the microwave, shut the door and set it on an automatic warming cycle before returning to her own side with the carton in hand.
"Right. Thanks." was all Mister Incredible could muster before a shrill beep sounded behind him. Reaching into the microwave, Bob retrieved the warm milk and noticed its consistency was much too thick to be anything but...

It was when Bob spun around that he saw the label in Helens hands - Heavy Whipping Cream - she had already tipped up the carton to her lips and had begun drinking the concentrated mix down. With each gulp, she fell deeper into the familiar feeling that she came to know from Edna Mode's sessions, just pushing herself a little more, a little further...

Bob could only look on conflicted - Helen was his wife, the vows he made to her on their wedding day felt synonymous with any criminal credo he sought to defend, and he would through sickness and in health, for better for worse...
But...
This was not the Helen Parr he married - the svelte and pliable Helen whom had only just existed the week prior had been superseded by a much heavier Helen.
A heavier Helen who stood before him now, standing in the glow of the refrigerator as she tiled the nearly empty carton of heavy cream up to keep the steady stream of calories flowing past her lips...
Drops of cream that had missed their mark now traced the contours of her jawline, outlining a very visible double chin.
While Helen had grown, her clothes had not, and the brunette's jeans were getting incredibly snug with her new ample assets - faring worse was her shirt, which was forced to stretch nearly as much as Elastigirl herself to remain buttoned up. Its limits were being test however, as it failed to cover at least an inch of exposed flesh just above the belt line.
With a final swallow, Helen finished with the carton and stretched an arm across the kitchen as she carried it over to the trash.

"Whew... I need to... *erp* pick up some more..."

Bob watched as Helen turned to leave, her plump rear bobbing and swaying with every step.
